      • indexFile

        protected void indexFile(java.io.File file,
             java.io.FilenameFilter filter)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an index file from the source which can be used by the search function. If source is a single file then it is used to generate an index. If source is a directory then all the files are indexed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
